Interface KRAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    APSFrameworkExtension, APSMediaPlayerOverlayController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    APSMediaPlayerButtonOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerControlsOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerHTMLOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerMidrollOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerMRAIDOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerSkipOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerTextOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerVimeoOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerYoutubeOverlayController, APSMRAIDExtension

    public interface KRAdapter
    he KRAdapter protocol allows an object to declare itself as being of a certain type.
    Author:
    Appscend
